task.summary: embarked on the creation of the mongodb access layer
Made a new server logger, lifted a bunch of mess out of server.ts and placed them into separate, neat files.
beginning to add support for authentication continued to rearrange code
registration logic is almost done - the only problem is that anybody can just make an account now. but we'll fix that later...
Passport authentication is now functional (finally) Webpack builds hover around 15s, which seems to be the best I can get
Added javascript linq shim, improved book and person APIs
Changed routing to work with Vue-Router history mode.
Began adding functionality for querying holds, modifying books
Added api route to query whether current user has checked out a book
